properties.name: app.cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: List of allowed origins allowed by the CORS filter.

properties.name: app.security.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used to sign JWT tokens.

properties.name: app.security.jwt.expiration-minutes
properties.description: Lifetime of generated JWT tokens expressed in minutes.

properties.name: app.security.jwt.refresh-expiration-minutes
properties.description: Lifetime of refresh tokens expressed in minutes before they become invalid.
